body.name: Nature's Bounty Vitamin D for Immune Support and Promotes Healthy Bones, 10000IU, Softgels, Multi-Color, 10,000 IU, 72 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins
features: IMMUNE SUPPORT: 72-count, 10000IU Vitamin D3 Softgels for immune health. Vitamin D by Nature’s Bounty may assist the immune system by helping to regulate T and B-lymphocytes. Vitamin D3 is a more potent form of Vitamin D
Product Note: Exposure to heat or sunlight may lead to melting/damage of product. Hence customers are expected to be available during the product delivery

STRONG, HEALTHY BONES: In addition to immune support, getting a sufficient amount of Vitamin D is critical to building and maintaining strong bones in adults. It is essential for calcium absorption to help support healthy bones. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 Softgels supplement the Vitamin D your body needs for overall health

YEAR-ROUND SUPPORT: Vitamin D3 supplements by Nature’s Bounty contain the same form of Vitamin D that is naturally formed in the body through exposure to sunshine. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 helps replicate the benefits of natural sunshine all year long

PURITY IS OUR PRIORITY: Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our rapid release Vitamin D3 Softgels are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners

FROM THE TRUSTED WELLNESS EXPERTS: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D supplements are a product of 50 years of dedication to quality, consistency and scientific research to make vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence
body.description: A daily dose of Nature's Bounty Vitamin D3 is a simple and effective way to show your immune system some love. (1) That’s because Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D is an essential nutrient for immune support. (1) By assisting with calcium absorption, Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 also helps maintain healthy bones in adults and it provides the benefits of the natural sunshine that living and working indoors can deprive us. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 Supplements contain the same form of Vitamin D that is naturally formed in the body through exposure to sunshine. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin D3 helps replicate the benefits of natural sunshine all year long. (1) Vitamin D Softgels from the vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty combine science, nature and 50 years of expertise and innovation to provide the easiest way to increase your daily intake of this important nutrient. When wellness is everything, the vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty have everything you need to get there. Our rapid release Vitamin D3 Softgels are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners. Each bottle of Nature's Bounty Vitamin D3 contains 72 rapid release softgels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wellness Support You Can Trust For 50 years, Nature’s Bounty has blended the best of nature with the latest in science and nutritional innovation. Living a healthier life means giving your body the nutritional support it needs to thrive. Nature’s Bounty, a leading herbal supplement brand, offers a range of General Wellness supplements using only the purest, most trusted ingredients, including Biotin, Magnesium, Calcium & Vitamin D, Vitamin B Complex, and Vitamin B12. Biotin plays an important role in the health of your skin and hair. (1) Magnesium supports optimal bone and muscle health, while Calcium helps maintain bone strength and Vitamin D to support your immune system health. (1) And for optimal energy metabolism and support, there’s a range of vitamin B supplements, including Vitamin B Complex and Vitamin B12. (1) At Nature’s Bounty, innovation – plus the wellness support you need – live at the intersection of nature and science.

Driving Innovation Through Scientific Expertise Our Scientific Advisory Council is made up of some of the most respected scientists and researchers in the field who play a key role in the Company’s product innovation and scientific advancement. Quality You Can Count On At Nature's Bounty, we prioritize a high standard of quality control to deliver the great supplements available. Our rigorous process ensures that every product meets our criteria for excellence. We are committed to providing you with the best possible experience and results for your health and wellness. Don’t Just Take Our Word for It We’re proud that our products are manufactured in state-of-the-art facilities that meet FDA’s regulations. We pride ourselves on using high quality ingredients, leaving no room for compromise. Trust that when you choose our products, you are choosing safety and efficacy above all else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nature Bounty is a good product. I have used Nature Bounty D3 2
reviews.reviewText: Be sure to check the oils used in this Nature Bounty product for those who have research as I have and understand the ratio of omega 3 and omega 6 oils in the body. Nature Bounty is a good product. I have used Nature Bounty D3 2,000 IU daily. Use this D3 10,000 IU with caution as the ingredients are Safflower Oil, Vegetable Glycerin Oil, and Sunflower Oil which are Omega 6 Oils.Too much Omega 6 in your body causes inflammation and health issues. The instructions on this bottle state to take daily and that it is for short term therapy for Vitamin D deficiencies. I decided for me to take 1 supplement weekly. When I begin supplementing with Vitamin D, my D levels were 10.5, critically low. I took Nature Bounty 2,000 IU and I doubled the amount to 4,000 IU, then tripled it to 6,000 IU then quad tripled to 8,000 IU and my D level elevated to 47.5. This is much better, but D levels should be between 80-100 per medical doctor's advice.Monitor your D levels with your physician when taking any Vitamin supplement, as I do so that you do not go over the 100% limit. The reason is that too much vitamin D can cause toxicity in the body. I hope this helps you to make a wise choice. Always look at the back of the label before purchasing any vitamin supplement product, especially if you have seafood allergies, as some supplements contain seafood ingredients such as shrimp, lobster and shellfish, and always monitor your vitamin levels with your physician.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I started taking 2 of these tablets a day per dr instructions. Previously I was taking 8000 ius a day and blood work indicated I was severely deficient in vitamin D. (I have Crohn's disease so I don't absorb nutrients well.)Now I take 20,000 ius a day. I haven't had new blood work but I can tell a difference. My anxiety and mild depression seem to have improved a lot since I've upped this dosage. Will be interested to see how the next blood work turns out.
